briefTitle: A Dose-finding and Confirmatory Trial of OPC-6535 in Patients With Active Crohn's Disease
officialTitle: A Multinational, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Dose-finding and Confirmatory Trial of OPC-6535 in Patients With Active Crohn's Disease
summary: The purpose of this study is to verify the safety and efficacy of OPC-6535 and determine the optimal dose by once-daily oral administration of OPC-6535 at 25 or 50 mg or placebo for 8 weeks in combination with base treatment (either a fixed oral dose of 5-aminosalicylic acid \[5-ASA\] or a fixed oral dose of 5-ASA plus enteral nutrition) in 180 patients with active Crohn's disease.
